title: Tales from the kangaroo's crypt (MAC & PC)
creator_credit: National Museum of Australia, University of New South Wales, Australian Broadcasting Corporation, The Riversleigh Society and Energee Entertainment
brief_description: This interactive CD-ROM takes you on a time-travelling mystery tour of the Australian fossil record from The PreCambrian Era 3500 million years ago, to the future in 2200 AD. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:MacIntosh: System 7, PC: Windows 3.1 or 95, optimised for 4X CD players.
